title: Scrambled Egg and Tomato Rice
instructions: In a bowl, beat the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add the beaten eggs to the skillet and scramble them until they are fully cooked.
Add the diced tomato to the skillet and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until the tomato softens.
Add the cooked rice to the skillet and stir well to combine with the scrambled eggs and tomato.
Drizzle soy sauce over the rice mixture and continue stirring until everything is evenly coated.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the rice is heated through.
Remove from heat and garnish with chopped green onions.
Serve hot as a simple and satisfying meal.
